 From: Noah Levitt=

Sent: Thursday, May 16, 2013 2:16 AM
Subject: Re: [arc=
hive-crawler] Heritrix
 


=C2=A0 
As far as I know it was never the case t=
hat "no of .arc file equals the no of seed url's
", unless it happened
by c=
oincidence. I think the default number of arc
s open
at a time in h1 was 5,=
 and in h3 it's only 1, so maybe your crawl coincidentally had 5 seeds. But=
 there would have been no 
source seed
to w/arc
affinity. 

There is an ope=
n jira for this feature though:=C2=A0https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER=
-1055

Noah

On Wed, May 15, 2013 at 3:55 AM, smritimalhotra <smritimalhotr=
a@...> wrote:

I'm using Heritrix 3.1.1 . The trend I observed is : 1=
 Job finishes and =C2=A0gives =C2=A0one .warc file .But in earlier version =
Heritrix 1.14.4 the no of .arc file equals the no of seed url's . How can I=
 achieve the same in Heritrix 3.1.1 ?
>Please help !
>Thanks in advance .
>=
